title: The Poetic Words Of A Dreamer
description: Welcome to my poetry book! All these words came directly from my head. So consider this is your only warning as to what you are about to read. Just kidding! There are only a few creepy poems. It is mostly made up of sparkles, colors, and bunnies!I can't promise that you will like this poetry, but I can guarantee these poems probably won't show up in your classroom. So come on and have a read. If you have the guts!
author: Emily Kirby
